00444 // ======================================================================
00445 //                                    Implementation of inlined methods =
00446 
00447 inline gint16 
00448 MEItemLayer::getGtkX(int32 lon) {
00449    return int16( rint((lon - m_lonSubFactor) * m_lonScaleFactor));
00450 }
00451 
00452 inline gint16 
00453 MEItemLayer::getGtkY(int32 lat) {
00454    return int16( rint((m_latSubFactor - lat) * m_latScaleFactor));
00455 }
